overview: A chain is only as strong as its weakest link, but itâ€™s important for the chain to be particularly strong at certain important points of contact. An academic paper is the same way. A paper is only as strong as its thesis. The thesis sets the tone for the entire paper, so itâ€™s important to come out of the gate strong. Writing a strong thesis statement can be a challenge, but not an insurmountable one. If you take special care while narrowing down your master thesis topics, you can build a strong <a href="http://urgentessay.co.uk/">essay</a> on the firm foundation of your thesis.
